doc.dc_description_s:
This collection (stacked series) of datasets is provided *as is* by
     Geocommons to UVA Library’s Scholars’ Lab. * // * No original metadata was provided with this
     dataset; thus information about its provenance, spatial detail, temporal extent, and upkeep are
     unknown* // * Datasets/Layers included in this datastack (with non-exclusive list of included
     attributes): * ponet_polygon * dnnet_polygon * clline_arc * rdline_arc * tsline_arc *
     utline_arc * aepoint_point * popoint_point * // * These data were made available to the
     University of Virginia for educational and research uses only. Access is restricted to
     students, faculty and staff of the University of Virginia.
